org.jemmy.input

Class ScrollTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.input.ScrollTrack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shifter

    public class ScrollTrack
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shifter
    Implementation of Shifter for controls owning a track which can be moved with mouse clicks. eg Slider, ScrollBar
    Author:
    ineverov

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jemmy.interfaces.Shifter

      static org.jemmy.env.Timeout SHIFT_CLICK_TIMEOUT
